ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] instrument skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Bad Thing to see while fear kiting that maxed skills can fix :) You miss a note.. You miss a note.. You miss a note.. You miss a note.. You miss a
ygData.messageBody:
Bad Thing to see while fear kiting that maxed skills can fix :)
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."
"You miss a note.."

.... Splat...

Tani/Halana
-----Original Message-----
From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
Sent: Friday, December 21, 2001 1:44 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] instrument skill


Well for one thing I find that it lowers Fizzle rates. besides I like to
keep my skills maxed. If I all of a sudden need that skill. Skills get more
and more tiresome to raise as you level..

Musiker, almost retired Minstrel, bertox
Musiker, Rocking Skald on Lancelot
